title: American drug overdose death rates the highest among wealthy nations

title_detail.value: American drug overdose death rates the highest among wealthy nations

summary: A new study found that the United States has the highest drug overdose death rates among a set of high-income countries. The study found that drug overdose death rates in the United States are 3.5 times higher on average when compared to 17 other high-income counties. The study is the first to demonstrate that the drug overdose epidemic is contributing to the widening gap in life expectancy between the United States and other high-income countries.
